website_summaries.verdict: We like this vest because it doubles as a life jacket for rough waters.
pros: Has an adjustable belt for a good fit
Large front pockets good for fly boxes
Includes a nice large zippered back pocket
Design allows for good range of motion while casting
Added security of having a comfortable and usable life vest is a big plus on this inexpensive vest
cons: The dual purpose nature of this vest means it does not provide the number of storage options of other vests

customer_reviews.title: It should be okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s “ok”, when it first arrives I though no way - to small, after adjusting straps it should work while I kayak. Top deep pockets you’ll need small hands to use, probably a good spot for my fishing license. But what can I expect for $40. Like others - I’ll need to pay attention to the zippers or they won’t last a season. Size, I’m 5.9 , 200 - with strap adjustments - it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and nicely built.
customer_reviews.text: The floating inserts were a little cheap made, I am 215lbs, the original inserts did not hold me above water. I just ordered some replacements and it made this product 5 star for me. Very comfy while kayaking and it has enough room in the arms to give you a nice cast while fishing. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY MATERIAL & DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: This fishing vest is well designed with many pockets and ample storage. The zippers have stood up well so far in season one. The material seems durable yet very light. Great solution if you get sick of dragging your tackle box around... For the money - IT'S A STEAL!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy V

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Already put the vest to use and it is great! I bought one for my wife as well and we both like the vest. Light weight, plenty of pockets and areas for accessories (if needed). Love that I can take out the floats (back, 2 sides) and able to use is as a bike riding vest (for example) great feature! Great price...fast delivery...very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS HAPPY

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my grandson! He absolutely loves it, and doesn't want to take it off. He loves all the pockets, and the fact it has flotation devices built into it. He is going fishing this weekend, and I'm sure he'll break it in then.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: great for kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: Got some new equipment in order to go fishing with my son on our new kayak. Need all of the little pockets and extra features for gear and fishing supplies. Great fit and has a great look too. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sketch

customer_reviews.title: Wear Your Tackle Box! Plenty Of Pockets
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, this is a very nice fishing vest. High marks for comfort. High marks for construction. Fabric is top quality. I’m not sure about it’s floatation abilities and hope I will never have to find out. lol Definitely worth the price. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Earic P.

customer_reviews.title: Best fishing vest ever
customer_reviews.text: Best fishing vest ever ! Plenty of spacious pockets perfect for someone that carries a lot of junk !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fishing vest to keep you afloat if needed. Zippers seems to be a little unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s not a bad deal! The pockets have lots of space and there’s tons of pockets. The only issue I have is the zippers. They do not seem very secure. So an updated review is to come when it gets put into use.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of useful pockets and fits me, a bigger guy which is a huge bonus. Just wish it was USCG approved.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Maeder

customer_reviews.title: OK for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it will do the job. Plenty of pockets and storage. 3 of the zippers broke after just a few uses, so they are pretty shoddy quality in that respect. You do get what you pay for, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dion Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Just missing the whistle. Lightweight. Quick shipping. Zippers could better quality. Not too bulky. Lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Diana J Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well made, high quality product - lots of storage pockets
customer_reviews.author: S. Landry

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper was on the wrong side, (maybe female)? No mention of that. Overall it seems to work well with plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ptmoe

customer_reviews.title: Many front pockets
customer_reviews.text: It is a lightweight fishing vest with flotation in zippered panels. Not US Coast Guard rated, but it will help better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: easily adjustable. Practical and useful! Came on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t like wearing a vest while boating or kayaking but this vest is light enough that it does not bother me. Tried it this past weekend while kayaking and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Toribio II

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a well made product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, wasn’t expecting such a nice vest for the price, can just jump right in to land the big one now!
customer_reviews.author: rob finely

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of pockets fits great and I like the colored zipper Grabbers. Makes it easy to find zipper to open while in kayak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY  VEST  !
customer_reviews.text: ADVERTISING SHOWS A MALE VEST ON A MALE MANNEQUIN - SHIPPED ME [ 2 ] FEMALE VEST AND THEY ARE LIGHT WEIGHT & FLIMSY ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is perfect. It has exceeded my expectations. Very good quality and tons of pockets for storage. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: It's way to small for an adult but will fit a kid just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable, and lots of handy storage compartments.
customer_reviews.text: I use my new life vest for kayaking and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stryjewski

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful... Needs strengthening in some of the functionality items.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Anguiano

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for fishing
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this vest fits and has plenty of compartments to store your gear. I went wading with it and also surf fishing and it did very good in both environments. It fits comfortably and I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M.

product_meta.title: Amarine Made Fly Fishing Vest Pack (Fishing Vest/Fishing Sling Pack/Fishing Backpack)
feature_bullets: SIZE: Universal Adult Size (Fits for the person who is less than 95kg/209lb)
PREMIUM TEXTILE & EPE FOAM: Crafted with a premium rips top polyester shell and replaceable EPE foam inside for superior buoyancy.
MULTI ZIPPED POCKETS: Four generous chest pocket, four zipped front pockets, two side mesh pocket, and one generous back pocket in total.
BREATHABLE MESH: Mesh on the back and mesh fabric inside deliver high breathability.
CONVENIENT OPEN SIDE: Open sides leave you with more room to paddle, cast or aim on the water.
